name: Jon Samwell - Blog examples
tagline: All the examples on my blog - jonsamwell.com
body:
### Welcome to my blog example code.
This page just lists all the example mini-sites I have done for my various [blog posts](http://www.jonsamwell.com).

###URL Route Authorization in Angular

The repo details the approach I take to securing routes and UI elements in angular.

See the example site [here]()
See the blog post [here]()
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
